quotes.quote: Hate is the revenge of a coward intimidated.
Manipulation aims at control, not cooperation.
A man convinced against his will is of the same opinion still.
Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
Creative people are often found either disagreeable or intimidating by mediocrities.
A nervous silence loosens tongues.
If you give in to intimidation, you'll go on being intimidated.

I know what the intimidation level of high school is. You're on a hamster wheel, running, running, running, trying so hard to fit in. It's all about how you deal with what you're given, feeling OK with being the odd man out before you're finally successful.
The persistent winner is not discouraged by a problem - he is challenged by it.
The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
The ones who hate me the most are the ones who don't scare me.
There is a stubbornness about me that can never bear to be frightened at the will of others. My courage always rises at every attempt to intimidate me.
A mighty person is one who can control their emotions and make of an enemy a friend.
Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim.
If you want to control someone, all you have to do is to make them feel afraid.
Ocean is not supposed to be scared of the drops.
Don't be intimidated by power, wealth or station, character alone makes all the difference.
To win one hundred victories in one hundred battles is not the acme of skill. To subdue the enemy without fighting is the acme of skill.
The argument from intimidation is a confession of intellectual impotence.
Men are intimidated by smart women. They make us want to kick up our game more.
The stupidity of gossips is that they become frightened when they see your face, and a little word from your mouth makes them vibrate like an electrocuted criminal.
A man who is intimate with God is not intimidated by man.
Any woman who is sure of her own wits, is a match, at any time, for a man who is not sure of his own temper.
Don't be intimidated by other people's opinions. Only mediocrity is sure of itself, so take risks and do what you really want to do.
A man of your valor deserves not another breath.
To destroy that which seeks to destroy me, God invites me to stand against it until it stands down and then falls down.
Don't be intimidated by what you don't know. That can be your greatest strength and ensure that you do things differently from everyone else.
One of the single most powerful things you can do to influence others is smile at them.
Better to master one mountain than a thousand foothills.
